definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
to endure/to bear with/to exercise patience/to restrain oneself/patience/endurance
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look

sentences.english: Conflow supplies high pressure underground equipment for coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 康福路爲煤礦領域提供井下耐高壓產品。

sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力強，耐重茬，耐旱，適應廣。

sentences.english: Signs include exercise intolerance, but often there is only a heart murmur.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀症狀包括運動不耐，但大多數病例僅有心臟雜音。

sentences.english: The properties of environmental stress cracking resistance (ESCR) of HDPE were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對HDPE的耐環境應力開裂性能進行了研究。

sentences.english: The cultivars with strong tolerance to chilling were easily induced by low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 耐冷性強的品種容易受低溫誘導。

sentences.english: It has environmentally protection, UV-resistant and-yellowing, and other advantages.
sentences.chinese: 具有環保，耐紫外光和不發黃等級優點。

sentences.english: Signs include cyanosis and exercise intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 症狀有紫紺和運動不耐。

sentences.english: To observe the hypoxia tolerance test and fatigue tolerance test of mice given CTCC.
sentences.chinese: 觀察各給藥組小鼠的耐疲勞能力及耐缺氧能力。

sentences.english: To observe the hypoxia tolerance test and fatigue tolerance test of mice given CTCC.
sentences.chinese: 觀察各給藥組小鼠的耐疲勞能力及耐缺氧能力。

sentences.english: Anti-shortcircuit; good performance to withstand the lightning impulse.
sentences.chinese: 抗短路，耐雷電衝擊性能好。

sentences.english: Two see hardness, scratch resistance, protective paint for wood work.
sentences.chinese: 二看硬度，耐劃傷，保護木器漆歷久彌新。

sentences.english: Valve electric drive motor is generally used to compare the impact of voltage.
sentences.chinese: 電動閥的驅動一般是用電機，比較耐電壓衝擊。

sentences.english: Hershey's Shelf Stable Milk is a Grade A milk procured from local family-owned dairies.
sentences.chinese: “好時”耐儲存牛奶是從本地奶牛場採購的A級牛奶。

sentences.english: Its hydrostatic pressure resistant is more than 50 KPa.
sentences.chinese: 它的耐靜水壓能力超過50KPa。

sentences.english: Has a particularly strong resistance to yellowing and weathering.
sentences.chinese: 具有特強的耐黃變性和耐候性。

sentences.english: Bending behaviors of functionally gradient piezoelectric curved cantilever was studied.
sentences.chinese: 挺度是衡量紙和紙板耐彎曲的強度性能。

definition: to break/to destroy/to devastate/to ravage/to repress
lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile
